home.meta_description: Ons verskaf 'n galery van Bing-daglikse agtergrondbeelde vir verskeie lande. U kan al die beelde sedert Mei 2009 gratis aflaai. Ultra HD-agtergronde is beskikbaar vanaf Februarie 2021.
home.page_title: Bing Agtergrond Argief - Daglikse Rekenaar Agtergronde
home.footer_description: This document showcases the beautiful Bing wallpaper collection from {country_name}. All wallpapers are available in Ultra HD, 2K, and 1080p resolutions. Click on any wallpaper to view details and download options.
